question: 1- He fades away and disappears completely as soon as you say his name, who is he?
2- What holds you while you hold it at the same time?
3- Something you give to a million people, and yet it stays with you without losing anything, what is it?
4- Yellow like gold, its head is used by humans and its leg by animals. What is it?
5- It has 5 fingers but it is not human, it has skin but it is not an animal, who is it?
6- What is the best possible treatment for dandruff?
7- Something that does not dissolve in water, and does not live on earth or in the sky, what is it?
8- If a huge elephant fell into a lake, how would it get out?
9- Why is the zebra considered an ancient animal?
10- What is the function of the ear in the human body?
11- How many letters are there?
12- What is the color resulting from mixing yellow with blue?
13- How many zeros are there in a trillion?
14- How many times has Brazil won the World Cup?
15- What is the disease called the disease of kings?
16- What is the most dangerous prison in the world, located on an island surrounded by water from all directions?
17- What is the highest plateau in the world?
18- How many minutes are in 5 hours?
19- Mention the name of an African country whose name begins with the letter N?
20- Mention the name of an animal that starts with the letter C?
21- Who is he who remains bound if guarded by one person, but if guarded by many he is freed from his chains?
22- What is red and green and looks like half a watermelon?
rightAnswer: The second half of that watermelon

question: 23- What are the three consecutive numbers whose product is 990?
